quote: You can't know, you can only believe - or not.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: You believe what your eyes want to believe!
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: It's all make believe, isn't it?
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: I believe in evidence. I believe in observation, measurement, and reasoning, confirmed by independent observers. I'll believe anything, no matter how wild and ridiculous, if there is evidence for it. The wilder and more ridiculous something is, however, the firmer and more solid the evidence will have to be.
author: Isaac Asimov,  The Roving Mind

quote: Believe only half of what you see and nothing that you hear.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: As long as you have life and breath, believe. Believe for those who cannot. Believe even if you have stopped believing. Believe for the sake of the dead, for love, to keep your heart beating, believe. Never give up, never despair, let no mystery confound you into the conclusion that mystery cannot be yours.
author: Mark Helprin,  A Soldier of the Great War

quote: I believe in looking reality straight in the eye and denying it.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: I believe I believe I can succeed, and this belief is the foundation for my belief.
author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.

quote: I don't want to believe. I want to know.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Have faith in your beliefs
author: Michael Christos Zeis

quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

quote: Think, think, think.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: To believe in nothing is as ridiculous as to believe in everything. Reason and factual evidence may convert a belief into knowledge.
author: Felix Alba-Juez

quote: Some things have to be believed to be seen
author: Ralph Hodgson

quote: People would rather believe than know.
author: Edward O. Wilson

quote: Some things have to be believed to be seen.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Believe so brightly that everyone sees the beauty in believing.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Believe in the wonderment of life, the magic of love, and the reality of death.
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: For desired conclusions, we ask ourselves, "Can I believe this?", but for unpalatable conclusions we ask, "Must I believe this?
author: Thomas Gilovich,  How We Know What Isn't So: The Fallibility of Human Reason in Everyday Life

quote: I really believe, or want to believe, really I am nuts, otherwise I'll never be sane.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: I believe in the hands that work, in the brains that think, and in the hearts that love...I believe in sunshine, fresh air, friendship, calm sleep, beautiful thoughts.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: We are willing to believe anything other than the truth.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: Believe in people, they fly for a day. Teach them to believe in themselves, they soar for a lifetime.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: I have a lot of faith. I mean, I believe I do.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I believe in books.
author: Carole Maso,  Room Lit By Roses

quote: Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: I believe in miracles.... I have to.
author: Terry Fox

quote: When we are in love we often doubt that which we most believe.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: You don’t believe things because they make your life better, you believe them because they’re true.
author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant

quote: Every man should believe in something.If not..he would doubt everything, even himself.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: I want to believe that I'm not wrong. I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain may beat down on me.
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: She believed, of course ... because without something to believe in, life would be intolerable.
author: Rosamunde Pilcher,  The Shell Seekers

quote: I think I exist, therefore I exist. I think.
author: David Gerrold,  The Man Who Folded Himself

quote: Belief consists in accepting the affirmations of the soul; unbelief, in denying them.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I have to believe much in God because I have lost my faith in man.
author: José Rizal,  Noli Me Tángere

quote: I shouldn't believe anything I say, if I were you-and that includes what I just told you.
author: Jasper Fforde,  The Eyre Affair

quote: I believe in study. I believe that men learn much through study. As a matter of fact, it has been my observationthat they learn little concerning things as they are, as they were, or as they are to come without study. I alsobelieve, however, and know, that learning by study is greatly accelerated by faith.
author: Marion G. Romney

quote: I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: How do you know it's not true if you don't believe in it?
author: Pete Hautman

quote: Belief means not wanting to know what is true.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Every concept of reality is all in our head, belief is what makes truth.
author: Christy Leigh Stewart

quote: Unfortunately this Electric Monk had developed a fault, and had started to believe all kinds of things, more or less at random. It was even beginning to believe things they'd have difficulty believing in Salt Lake City.
author: Douglas Adams,  Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency

quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
author: William James

quote: Think, Believe, Dream, and Dare.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: Faith to me is trusting in every evidence that something is―that it  is  possible, that it  is  significant, that it  is  real.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: Faith ― acceptance of which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove.
author: Dan Brown,  The Da Vinci Code

quote: Believe what you believe and it will be, believe what others believe and they will consume you!
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: I believed in immaculate conception and spontaneous combustion. I believed in aliens from outer space and vampires, prophecy, and the resurrection of the dead. I had deja vu many times each day. I was thirteen.
author: Kate Braverman,  Small Craft Warnings: Stories
